title: Authors and Citation
text: Noblet Guillaume. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Guillaume N (2022). visualizeR: color! viz!. https://github.com/gnoblet/visualizeR, https://gnoblet.github.io/visualizeR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {visualizeR: What a color! What a viz!},   author = {Noblet Guillaume},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/gnoblet/visualizeR, https://gnoblet.github.io/visualizeR/}, }

what: What a color! What a viz!
title: What a color! What a viz!
text: color! viz! visualizeR proposes utils get REACH AGORA colors, ready--go color palettes, visualization functions (horizontal hist graph instance).

title: What a color! What a viz!
text: can install last version visualizeR GitHub :

title: What a color! What a viz!
text: Roadmap follows: Add IMPACT’s colors Add color palettes internal documentation remains added --7-color palettes black color palettes Add new types visualization (e.g. dumbbell plot) Use examples Add ease-map functions Add interactive functions (maps graphs)

title: What a color! What a viz!
text: Please, hesitate pull request new viz colors color palettes, email request change (guillaume.noblet@reach-initiative.org gnoblet@zaclys.net).

title: What a color! What a viz!
code: library(visualizeR) # Get all saved REACH colors, named cols_reach(unnamed = F)

text: hbar() gains new boolean argument reverse pass pal_reach() pal_agora(), indicating color palette reversed .

title: visualizeR 0.1.3.9000
text: Small change hbar(): removes error arg within simplevis::gg_hbar() call.

title: visualizeR 0.1.2.9000
text: duplicate scale_color() function, now scale_fill()

title: visualizeR 0.1.1.9000
text: Added two horizontal bar functions: hbar(), hbar_percent() (#3) Added internals check missing columns bad arguments (#3) Modified theme_reach() documentation Add buffer_bbox() function produce buffered bbox, e.g. use tmap

title: visualizeR 0.1.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package Initiate repo
